abstracts.cdata!:
The project aims to make the port system
            a more efficient operation and in particular to contribute
            to more efficient resource use and to the improved
            utilization of Brazil's port capacity. The project will
            consist of three components; first, an institution building
            component to streamline subsector organization and port
            system planning and management, and to improve operational
            practices; second, technical assistance will be provided to
            upgrade the research and operational capacity of the
            National Hydraulics Research Institute through the purchase
            of specialized equipment, and software for and training in
            mathematical modelling. The third and final component is
            assistance in engineering and preparation of bid documents
            for high priority projects to be identified as part of
            improving investment planning.
